name: HouseCorridon
_source: s;CorridonWife;Corr? Oh, sweetest, has the fighting finally stopped?
s;Corridon;No, I...{w} I'm not done yet.|For what good it'll do, I have to keep on going.
s;CorridonWife;Are you sure you're alright?|With your injuries like this-
s;Corridon;I'm well aware of that.{w} My injuries are my burden to bear.{w}{clear}I only fear that I may be imposing that burden upon others...|...{w} Again.

s;Corridon;But it's true.{w} It was the same way back during the war.{w} I fall behind.{w}{clear}I'm weak.{w} I need to be protected.{w}{clear}It's pathetic.{w} Emasculating.|And it keeps happening...
s;SCorridon;...{w} I've been, ah...{w} discharged.|Sent home.{w} So, well...{w} here I am.
s;SCorridonWife;Discharged?{w} Are you...{w} I-I mean, did you do something wrong, or are you-?
s;SCorridon;I can't fight anymore.{w} I'm...{w} I can't...{w} do much of anything, now.{w}{clear}This isn't how I wanted to come back to you.{w} I'm...{w} I'm sorry.
s;SCorridon;They got me, is what happened.
s;SCorridonWife;...{w} Corridon...{w} These wounds...|How did you take so many and still survive in the heat of battle?
s;SCorridon;...{w} I got "lucky."{w} I guess.{w} I-
s;SCorridonWife;Be honest with me.{w} These don't look like battle scars, Corr.{w}{clear}I'm a blacksmith's wife.{w} I know where the gaps in your armour lie.|In more ways than one...

s;SCorridon;I-I...{w} I couldn't keep going.{w}{clear}If I'd tried to simply leave, they would call me a deserter.{w}{clear}And...{w} they'd be right.{w}{clear}So I had to give them a reason to send me home.{w} This was it.
s;SCorridonWife;But Corridon...{w} why?{w} These wounds are so deep...{w} you'll never heal!

s;SCorridon;Because I couldn't keep relying on the others to protect me anymore!{w}{clear}I was...{w} sick of it.{w} Sick of being a burden, sick of falling behind,|sick of all of it!{w} I needed to get|out, before I got somebody hurt.{w}{clear}I'm...{w} not cut out for fighting.

s;SCorridonWife;Corridon...{w} oh, my dear Corridon...{w}{clear}They protected you to keep this very thing from happening! But...|now, you've thrown that all away!{w}{clear}Everything they did, everything we did, thrown away for your pride!
s;SCorridon;No, it wasn't for pride, it was-

s;SCorridonWife;Don't lie to me!{w} It wasn't about their safety or their burden!{w}{clear}It was about you feeling weak!{w}{clear}But Corridon, you've never been weak!{w} I've told you so many times,|you are a strong, brave man...|so why won't you believe me?
s;SCorridon;...{w} I want to.{w} But every day, I look for proof, and every day...{w}{clear}I fail to find it.{w} Every day.{w}{clear}Now, at least...{w} nobody will call on me to do what I cannot.
s;CorridonWife;... Look at you.{w} Fighting so hard to keep the survivors safe, even...|even after...{w} what happened.
s;Corridon;Heh.{w} Aye, I suppose I went back on my word.{w} I answered the call.{w}{clear}Some fool I am, thinking I've got the right, but still...{w}{clear}Here I am.{w} Helping however I can.

s;CorridonWife;Then...{w} take this.{w} Maybe it'll help in ways that aren't fighting.{w}{clear}You're good for more than that.|Now, go on{semicolon}{w} get back out there!|I'll be right behind you, okay?
s;Corridon;Aye...{w} stay safe, you hear me?|I'm gonna get us out of here.
update_achievement;11;A War to Belong To;Viewed Corridon's Flashback in Ch4.
